function.name: add_item
function.description: IMPORTANT: Call this whenever the user picks up, takes, pockets, grabs, acquires, receives, finds, buys, crafts, or otherwise obtains any item. Even simple actions like 'I pocket the ashtray' or 'I take the keys' should trigger this tool.

description.description: A brief description of the item

obtained.description: How or where the item was obtained (e.g., 'found in dungeon', 'quest reward', 'purchased from merchant')
